subject: Re: Checking if a file in a directory is older than 20 mins.
body:
Chas Owens wrote:>
> #!/usr/bin/perl
> 
> for my $file (<.* *>) {
>        print "$file is ", int(24*60 * -M $file), " minutes old\n";
> }

Thanks Chas!  Exactly what I was looking for =).

Cheers
-Chris
